name: To The Moon! (tfinnm)
description:
To The Moon! is a simulator in which you can pilot a space ship and manage your mission to complete objectives. This game uses allows you to simulate a variety of famous real world space craft and uses data collected from real world launches.

To The Moon! also makes an excellent tool for labs in physics classes that are still stuck in distance learning, as it provides data collection of the physics data directly to the user.
